name: ARRaycastQuery.Target
desc: The types of surface you allow a raycast to intersect with.

items.name: case estimatedPlane
items.desc: A raycast target that specifies nonplanar surfaces, or planes about which ARKit can only estimate.

items.name: case existingPlaneGeometry
items.desc: A raycast target that requires a plane to have a definitive size and shape.

items.name: case existingPlaneInfinite
items.desc: A raycast target that specifies a detected plane, regardless of its size and shape.
